title: Gill St. Bernard's (1) at Monroe (2) - Boys Soccer
content:
Monroe made an opening day statement by upsetting Gill St. Bernard's, No. 5 in the NJ.com Top 20, 2-1, at the GMC vs. Central Jersey Classic in Monroe. 

Senior Alex Fernandez scored a pair of goals for the Falcons and Nick Rios made seven saves. 

Steven Bednarsky scored a goal for Gill St. Bernard's while senior Aaron Hinton made five saves.
